quote: Morale was deteriorating and it was all Yossarian's fault. The country was in peril, he was jeopardizing his traditional rights of freedom and independence by daring to exercise them.
quote_letters: MORALE WAS DETERIORATING AND IT WAS ALL YOSSARIANS FAULT THE COUNTRY WAS IN PERIL HE WAS JEOPARDIZING HIS TRADITIONAL RIGHTS OF FREEDOM AND INDEPENDENCE BY DARING TO EXERCISE THEM
